Eevee you are too cute.
@allanlasser I've heard it referred to as the "roach pocket". Seems about right to me.
I think Eevee might really like Portishead. She is just relaxinnn'.

playing a little Skate 2. http://raptr.com/pseudoplacebo

Listening to French rap and playing with Processing.
A really great api that turns location names into longitude and latitude, I'm sure this will come in handy: http://is.gd/z9DU #notetoself
"My burps smell bad" -> "I need a breath mint for my stomach" -> "Peppermint tea?" - I am drinking peppermint tea.
Well. I want to sleep early, and now here I am, at 8:00. Awake. Listening to the song we recorded at practice yesterday.
@allanlasser Haha, that's what every person I've asked to come has said... what were they thinking playing on a Wednesday?!
Hey, any of you Tweeple following me live in NY? Like Animal Collective? I seriously can't find a bro to go see them at Terminal 5 on Wed.
At Grandfather's house, typing this on his magnificent Macbook Air. Which is nice, but noticeably slower than the iMac. Still...
@safetyguy1656 It's a jailbreak thing. I dunno if I could handle my iPhone not being jailbroken. http://is.gd/fwu
I really and truly love my iPhone (full stop?) scrobbling the music I listen to over EDGE. Makes my numbers much more accurate.
Public bathrooms are weird. Not that I have a phobia. They're just an odd idea, I think.
My Desk - Photo: http://bkite.com/008qu
Setting up Brightkite. I was skeptical at first, but I can definitely see myself using this in the future.
For those who (are insane?!) are interested in what I was just working on, here is the spreadsheet of Health Care Info - http://is.gd/ftb
Eating a pretty delicious Tuna sandwich and researching Health Care Insurance providers in New Jersey...
Oooh, M83 is playing in williamsburg. Maybe I will go? It's the day before my flight to AZ from newark, so I dunno.
Gmail is actually really nice on the iPhone. Pretty fast over Edge. I get great service here, which I am rather happy about.
http://twitpic.com/104p <- Holy crap. Paintball machine gun...
Wow. The new Twitterrific is pretty rad. As is Colloquy. I need to update my apps more often on my home machine.
Sitting in the office. Seriously considering purchasing this new apple keyboard. It's like typing on a cloud. =']
Good morning, twitter.
Being fat. Watching Survivor.
